heading: What to Expect During Treatment
subTitle: - A Comfortable and Personalized Experience Awaits You!
paragraph1: We begin with a private consultation, during which we discuss your concerns, medical history, and wellness goals. During treatment sessions, you'll relax in a comfortable, private treatment room while our specialist inserts the VTone applicator. The device remains in place for approximately 30 minutes, delivering customized muscle stimulation.
paragraph2: There's zero downtime. You can resume all normal activities immediately, including work, exercise, and intimacy. Most patients require a series of 6-8 treatments, scheduled 1-2 weeks apart, for optimal results. However, your treatment plan will be tailored to your specific needs and goals.
paragraph3: Results develop progressively as your pelvic floor muscles strengthen. Many women notice improvements in bladder control within the first few sessions, with continued enhancement throughout their treatment series and beyond.
imageAlt: Woman cycling confidently after VTone treatment
